com.easyandroidanimations.library

Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.easyandroidanimations.library.Animation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlindAnimation, BlinkAnimation, BounceAnimation, ExplodeAnimation, FadeInAnimation, FadeOutAnimation, FlipHorizontalAnimation, FlipHorizontalToAnimation, FlipVerticalAnimation, FlipVerticalToAnimation, FoldAnimation, HighlightAnimation, ParallelAnimator, PathAnimation, PuffInAnimation, PuffOutAnimation, RotationAnimation, ScaleInAnimation, ScaleOutAnimation, ShakeAnimation, SlideInAnimation, SlideInUnderneathAnimation, SlideOutAnimation, SlideOutUnderneathAnimation, TransferAnimation, UnfoldAnimation

    public abstract class Animation
extends java.lang.Object
    The parent class of all animation classes.
